python.download_guidance:
import requests
from bs4 import BeautifulSoup
import re

def get_ncsc_guidance(topic='ransomware'):
    """Download NCSC guidance on specific topics - FREE!"""
    
    # Search for guidance
    search_url = f'https://www.ncsc.gov.uk/search?q={topic}'
    response = requests.get(search_url)
    soup = BeautifulSoup(response.text, 'html.parser')
    
    guidance_links = []
    
    # Find guidance articles
    for article in soup.find_all('div', class_='search-result'):
        title_elem = article.find('h3')
        if title_elem:
            link = title_elem.find('a')
            if link and '/guidance/' in link.get('href', ''):
                guidance_links.append({
                    'title': link.text.strip(),
                    'url': f"https://www.ncsc.gov.uk{link['href']}"
                })
    
    return guidance_links

# Get ransomware guidance
guidance = get_ncsc_guidance('ransomware')
for g in guidance[:5]:
    print(f"- {g['title']}")
    print(f"  URL: {g['url']}")
python.parse_rss:
import feedparser
import requests
from datetime import datetime

# Parse NCSC RSS feeds - COMPLETELY FREE!
feeds = {
    'all': 'https://www.ncsc.gov.uk/api/1/services/v1/all-rss-feed.xml',
    'news': 'https://www.ncsc.gov.uk/api/1/services/v1/news-rss-feed.xml',
    'reports': 'https://www.ncsc.gov.uk/api/1/services/v1/report-rss-feed.xml',
    'guidance': 'https://www.ncsc.gov.uk/api/1/services/v1/guidance-rss-feed.xml'
}

for feed_name, feed_url in feeds.items():
    print(f"\n=== NCSC {feed_name.upper()} (FREE) ===")
    feed = feedparser.parse(feed_url)
    
    for entry in feed.entries[:5]:
        print(f"\nTitle: {entry.title}")
        print(f"Link: {entry.link}")
        print(f"Published: {entry.published}")
        if hasattr(entry, 'summary'):
            print(f"Summary: {entry.summary[:200]}...")
